clinical_study.brief_title: The Clinical Impact and Outcomes of Interventional Endoscopy Procedures
clinical_study.official_title: The Clinical Impact and Outcomes of Interventional Endoscopy Procedures

brief_summary.textblock: The main purpose of the protocol is to collect and evaluate performance data after patients undergoing various interventional endoscopy procedures performed at H. H. Chao Comprehensive Digestive Disease Center (CDDC).

detailed_description.textblock: In general, the outcome data includes clinical management, hospitalization, and complications; to determine costs associated with endoscopy procedures; to determine performance data including technical success, procedure time, rate of repeat interventions; to compare endoscopy performance and outcome data collected at University of California, Irvine (UCI) and results from other institutions previously published in the literature. Additional parameters might be collected for specific interventional endoscopy procedures.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Day of procedure up to 5 years for follow-up (if needed).
primary_outcome.description: Outcome data includes clinical management (such as hospitalization information, and complications, costs associated with endoscopy procedures, etc.).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day of procedure up to 5 years for follow-up (if needed).
secondary_outcome.description: Outcome performance data (such as, technical success, procedure time, rate of repeat interventions, lab/pathology results, etc.)

arm_group.description: Chart review of patients who had a procedure done at H. H. Chao Comprehensive Digestive Disease Center

study_pop.textblock: Patients with gastrointestinal disease(s) undergoing various interventional endoscopy procedures performed at H. H. Chao Comprehensive Digestive Disease Center (CDDC).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subjects who are 18 years of age or older
- Subjects who are scheduled for a procedure at the H. H. Chao Comprehensive Digestive Disease Center (CDDC).
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects who are not 18 years of age or older
- Subjects who are scheduled for a procedure at the H. H. Chao Comprehensive Digestive Disease Center (CDDC).
